thread.title: Tigers agree to dedication to teacher who died playing football
thread.title_full: Tigers agree to dedication to teacher who died playing football | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Tigers agree to dedication to teacher who died playing football
text:
Hull City have agreed to a dedication, in todays game, to a teacher that passed away playing football earlier this month.
James Moorfoot who died whilst playing football Credit: Facebook 28-year-old James Moorfoot passed away suddenly and unexpectedly whilst playing football for Langtoft AFC on Saturday February 11th.
He was a season ticket holder at the KCOM Stadium.
Hull City have agreed to a dedication for James during the 28th minute of today's match vs Burnley.
The dedication will be in the form of a picture of James along with a message from those closest to him which will be displayed on the large screens inside the stadium.
Last updated Sat 25 Feb 2017 East Yorkshire Hull
